title: Bug 103963 - No friendly error message displayed when there is no data for series
description: When there is no data available for a series in the chart, a friendly error message should be displayed. However, currently, no error message is shown.
OB: After selecting a column without data, the expected behavior is for a friendly error message to be displayed, but this is not happening.
EB: The actual behavior is that no friendly error message is displayed when there is no data for a series in the chart.
SR:
To reproduce the bug:
1. Create a chart.
2. Set the data definition for the chart.
3. Select a column in the data that does not have any data available.
